oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A new map of Mexico, California & Oregon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A map of Mexico, California, and Oregon in 1848 created upon the conclusion of the Mexican-American war that shows movements of U.S. troops in early stages of Mexican-American War. Includes inset of the Yucatan Peninsula showing the Mexican departements of Chiapas, Tabasco, and "Merida or Yucatan."
This map appeared in the book, ""The twelve months volunteer; or, Journal of a private, in the Tennessee regiment of cavalry, in the campaign, in Mexico, 1846-7..."" by George C. Furber.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mexico--Maps; West (U.S.)--Maps
Maps;
